scripts.git:bundle: npm run git:add && npm run git:commit && npm run git:push
scripts.git:commit: git commit -m "ðŸ¤–ðŸ§¶ | Automatic deploy by yarn"
scripts.git:all: echo "git[all]: Running git:all on local machine" && npm run git:bundle
scripts.vercel:dev: echo "vercel[dev]: Running `deploy` script on providers: Vercel"
scripts.deploy:dev: echo "deploy[dev]: Running `deploy` script on providers: Heroku, Vercel" && npm run git:all && npm run vercel:dev
scripts.deploy:prod: echo "deploy[prod]: Running `deploy` script on providers: Heroku, Vercel" && npm run git:all && npm run vercel:prod
